Class SensorResource

  • java.lang.Object
    • sk.fri.uniza.microservice.sensor.SensorResource

  • @Path(value="/sensor")
 @Produces(value="text/html")
public class SensorResource
extends Object
    Reprezentuje cestu k webovej stranke na senzor.
    Author:
    Matus Humaj, Jozef Magdolen, Tomas Urban
